description:
Yachiyo, Sato and Kyoko find photos of themselves from years ago in a photo album that Soma brings to work. Sato and Yachiyo reminisce about how they first met at Wagnaria. Also, due to a ghost story that Yamada tells, an unforeseen incident transpires.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ano Koro no Futari, Yachiyo to Satou. to, Youkoso Takanashi Ke e
The Way They Were... Yachiyo and Sato, Welcome to the Takanashis.
あの頃の二人, 八千代と佐藤. と, ようこそ小鳥遊[たかなし]家へ
